title: ARURF Release Date?
body: I was wondering if anyone has seen or heard when ARURF will leave the PBE and join the live servers. Thanks

replies.body: As far as I know, no official release date/time has been stated, but generally once something goes up on the PBE, it will show up with the next patch, and featured modes tend to become available *either* with the patch, or a day or two after the patch (so likely Wednesday-Friday next week).
Never, riot has discontinued gamemodes for TFT for more money revenue. Go next
